name: War On Terror:Shoot Strike
description:
An addictive first person shooter game is here!
You are a well trained elite member of special force.Bad terrorists are back!
Aim and shoot all the terrorists, who appear in front of you.
Use your fast reflexes to defeat the bad guys,kill them one by one.
Complete your task before they kill you.
Sniper the bad guys and save the world!
Have fun.
